QuestData.Title: Moth-Ridden
QuestData.Description: Moths have infested the library. Moths!$B$BAny librarian worth his letters knows that moths are the most dangerous threat to paper, second only to bookworms.$B$BAs it turns out, my assistants are a useless bunch of insect-fearing cowards.$B$BPlease, you MUST help me get rid of the moths immediately! The works of a thousand pandaren storytellers depend on you!
QuestData.CompletionText: I can see the moths eating the pages from here!
QuestData.RewardText: Yes, yes, thank you! You've thinned out their numbers wonderfully.
